content: San Francisco IHHQ audit revealed 47% increase in prior auth requests for neurodiagnostics July-September 2023. Notable concentration among tech sector employees covered under employer group plan GX-2295. Claims processor noted repeated consultations with UCSF Memory and Aging Center specialists, particularly for cases involving circadian rhythm disruptions. File cross-references community health report about abnormal prion protein findings in Mission Bay area lab workers.
